mapper.insert: insert into t_sys_org ( org_id, org_nm, org_type, concat_persion, phone, found_time, upper_org, root_org, is_leaf, status, is_dept, create_on, create_by, update_on, update_by) values (#{orgId},#{orgName},#{orgType},#{concatPersion},#{phone},#{foundTime},#{upperOrg},#{root_org},#{isLeaf},'1','0',now(),#{createBy},now(),#{updateBy})

insert into t_org_detail ( org_id, org_code, org_address_relation, elct_Type, lead_time, current_leader_time, current_lead_out_time, elct_shoud_people_count, elct_act_people_count, upper_sure_org_count, act_upper_org_per_count, change_org_relation_auth, is_del_part_person_auth, org_job_phone, belong_area, trans_code, fix_phone, address, field1, field2, field3, field4, field5, status, create_on, create_by, update_on, update_by ) values ( #{orgId}, #{orgCode}, #{orgAddressRelation}, #{elctType}, #{leadTime}, #{currentLeaderTime}, #{currentLeadOutTime}, #{elctShoudPeopleCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{elctActPeopleCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{upperSureOrgCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{actUpperOrgPerCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{changeOrgRelationAuth}, #{isDelPartPersonAuth}, #{orgJobPhone}, #{belongArea}, #{transCode}, #{fixPhone}, #{address}, #{field1}, #{field2}, #{field3}, #{field4}, #{field5}, '1', now(), #{createBy}, now(), #{updateBy} )
mapper.select: select org_id, org_nm, upper_org from t_sys_org where status='1' and is_dept='0'

select org.org_id, org.org_nm, org.org_type, org.concat_persion, org.phone, org.upper_org, org.found_time, orgdetail.org_code, orgdetail.org_address_relation, orgdetail.elct_Type, orgdetail.lead_time, orgdetail.current_leader_time, orgdetail.current_lead_out_time, orgdetail.elct_shoud_people_count, orgdetail.elct_act_people_count, orgdetail.upper_sure_org_count, orgdetail.act_upper_org_per_count, orgdetail.change_org_relation_auth, orgdetail.is_del_part_person_auth, orgdetail.org_job_phone, orgdetail.fix_phone, orgdetail.belong_area, orgdetail.trans_code, orgdetail.address, orgdetail.field1, orgdetail.field2, orgdetail.field3, orgdetail.field4, orgdetail.field5 from t_sys_org org left join t_org_detail orgdetail on org.org_id=orgdetail.org_id and org.status='1' where org.org_id=#{orgId}

( WITH recursive org_cte AS ( SELECT sorg.org_id, sorg.org_nm, sorg.org_type, sorg.concat_persion, sorg.phone, sorg.found_time, sorg.is_dept, sorg.upper_org, orgleader.leader FROM t_sys_org sorg LEFT JOIN ( SELECT GROUP_CONCAT( user_name ) leader, org_id FROM t_org_leader_detail WHERE STATUS = '1' GROUP BY org_id ) orgleader ON sorg.org_id = orgleader.org_id WHERE sorg.org_id = #{orgId} AND sorg.STATUS = '1' UNION ALL SELECT org.org_id, org.org_nm, org.org_type, org.concat_persion, org.phone, org.found_time, org.is_dept, org.upper_org, orgleader.leader FROM t_sys_org org LEFT JOIN ( SELECT GROUP_CONCAT( user_name ) leader, org_id FROM t_org_leader_detail WHERE STATUS = '1' GROUP BY org_id ) orgleader ON org.org_id = orgleader.org_id INNER JOIN org_cte sysorg ON org.org_id = sysorg.upper_org AND org.STATUS = '1' ) SELECT ote.* FROM org_cte ote LEFT JOIN ( SELECT urole.user_id, osuser.org_id FROM t_user_role urole LEFT JOIN t_org_user osuser ON urole.user_id = osuser.user_id WHERE urole.role_id = 'f99e26b6-8f95-4049-b719-36609fe76fea1' AND osuser.STATUS = '1' AND urole.STATUS = '1' ) ouser ON ote.org_id = ouser.org_id LEFT JOIN t_user tuser ON ouser.user_id = tuser.user_id ) UNION ( WITH recursive org_cte AS ( SELECT sorg.org_id, sorg.org_nm, sorg.org_type, sorg.concat_persion, sorg.phone, sorg.found_time, sorg.is_dept, sorg.upper_org, orgleader.leader FROM t_sys_org sorg LEFT JOIN ( SELECT GROUP_CONCAT( user_name ) leader, org_id FROM t_org_leader_detail WHERE STATUS = '1' GROUP BY org_id ) orgleader ON sorg.org_id = orgleader.org_id WHERE sorg.org_id = #{orgId} AND sorg.STATUS = '1' UNION ALL SELECT org.org_id, org.org_nm, org.org_type, org.concat_persion, org.phone, org.found_time, org.is_dept, org.upper_org, orgleader.leader FROM t_sys_org org LEFT JOIN ( SELECT GROUP_CONCAT( user_name ) leader, org_id FROM t_org_leader_detail WHERE STATUS = '1' GROUP BY org_id ) orgleader ON org.org_id = orgleader.org_id INNER JOIN org_cte sysorg ON sysorg.org_id = org.upper_org AND org.STATUS = '1' ) SELECT ote.* FROM org_cte ote LEFT JOIN ( SELECT urole.user_id, osuser.org_id FROM t_user_role urole LEFT JOIN t_org_user osuser ON urole.user_id = osuser.user_id WHERE urole.role_id = 'f99e26b6-8f95-4049-b719-36609fe76fea1' AND osuser.STATUS = '1' AND urole.STATUS = '1' ) ouser ON ote.org_id = ouser.org_id LEFT JOIN t_user tuser ON ouser.user_id = tuser.user_id )
SELECT org_id FROM t_org_user WHERE user_id = #{userId} and status='1'

SELECT tmp.* FROM ( ( WITH recursive org_cte AS ( SELECT sorg.org_id, sorg.org_nm, sorg.upper_org, usr.user_id, usr.user_name, userdtl.gender, userdtl.phone, userdtl.birth_time, userdtl.nation, userdtl.education FROM t_sys_org sorg LEFT JOIN t_org_user orguser ON sorg.org_id = orguser.org_id AND orguser.STATUS = '1' AND sorg.STATUS = '1' LEFT JOIN t_user usr ON orguser.user_id = usr.user_id AND usr.record_flag = '1' LEFT JOIN t_user_dtl userdtl ON orguser.user_id = userdtl.user_id WHERE sorg.org_id = #{orgId} UNION ALL SELECT org.org_id, org.org_nm, org.upper_org, usr.user_id, usr.user_name, userdtl.gender, userdtl.phone, userdtl.birth_time, userdtl.nation, userdtl.education FROM t_sys_org org LEFT JOIN t_org_user orguser ON org.org_id = orguser.org_id AND orguser.STATUS = '1' AND org.STATUS = '1' LEFT JOIN t_user usr ON orguser.user_id = usr.user_id AND usr.record_flag = '1' LEFT JOIN t_user_dtl userdtl ON orguser.user_id = userdtl.user_id INNER JOIN org_cte sysorg ON org.org_id = sysorg.upper_org AND org.STATUS = '1' ) SELECT ote.* FROM org_cte ote ) UNION ( WITH recursive org_cte AS ( SELECT sorg.org_id, sorg.org_nm, sorg.upper_org, usr.user_id, usr.user_name, userdtl.gender, userdtl.phone, userdtl.birth_time, userdtl.nation, userdtl.education FROM t_sys_org sorg LEFT JOIN t_org_user orguser ON sorg.org_id = orguser.org_id AND orguser.STATUS = '1' AND sorg.STATUS = '1' LEFT JOIN t_user usr ON orguser.user_id = usr.user_id AND usr.record_flag = '1' LEFT JOIN t_user_dtl userdtl ON orguser.user_id = userdtl.user_id WHERE sorg.org_id = #{orgId} UNION ALL SELECT org.org_id, org.org_nm, org.upper_org, usr.user_id, usr.user_name, userdtl.gender, userdtl.phone, userdtl.birth_time, userdtl.nation, userdtl.education FROM t_sys_org org LEFT JOIN t_org_user orguser ON org.org_id = orguser.org_id AND orguser.STATUS = '1' AND org.STATUS = '1' LEFT JOIN t_user usr ON orguser.user_id = usr.user_id AND usr.record_flag = '1' LEFT JOIN t_user_dtl userdtl ON orguser.user_id = userdtl.user_id INNER JOIN org_cte sysorg ON sysorg.org_id = org.upper_org AND org.STATUS = '1' ) SELECT ote.* FROM org_cte ote ) ) tmp WHERE 1=1
and INSTR( tmp.user_name, #{userName} ) > 0
mapper.update: UPDATE t_sys_org SET STATUS = '0' WHERE org_id IN ( WITH recursive org_cte AS ( SELECT org_id FROM t_sys_org WHERE org_id = #{orgId} AND STATUS = '1' UNION ALL SELECT org.org_id FROM t_sys_org org INNER JOIN org_cte sysorg ON sysorg.org_id = org.upper_org AND org.STATUS = '1' ) SELECT * FROM org_cte )

UPDATE t_org_user SET STATUS = '0' WHERE org_id IN ( WITH recursive org_cte AS ( SELECT org_id FROM t_sys_org WHERE org_id = #{orgId} AND STATUS = '1' UNION ALL SELECT org.org_id FROM t_sys_org org INNER JOIN org_cte sysorg ON sysorg.org_id = org.upper_org AND org.STATUS = '1' ) SELECT * FROM org_cte )

UPDATE t_user_role SET STATUS = '0' WHERE user_id IN ( WITH recursive org_cte AS ( SELECT org_id, org_nm, phone, found_time, is_dept, upper_org FROM t_sys_org WHERE org_id = #{orgId} AND STATUS = '1' UNION ALL SELECT org.org_id, org.org_nm, org.phone, org.found_time, org.is_dept, org.upper_org FROM t_sys_org org INNER JOIN org_cte sysorg ON sysorg.org_id = org.upper_org AND org.STATUS = '1' ) SELECT tuser.user_id FROM org_cte ote LEFT JOIN ( SELECT urole.user_id, osuser.org_id FROM t_user_role urole LEFT JOIN t_org_user osuser ON urole.user_id = osuser.user_id WHERE urole.role_id = 'f99e26b6-8f95-4049-b719-36609fe76fea1' AND osuser.STATUS = '1' AND urole.STATUS = '1' ) ouser ON ote.org_id = ouser.org_id LEFT JOIN t_user tuser ON ouser.user_id = tuser.user_id )

UPDATE t_sys_org
org_nm = #{orgName},
org_type = #{orgType},
phone = #{phone},
concat_persion = #{concatPersion},
upper_org = #{upperOrg},
found_time = #{foundTime},
update_by = #{updateBy}, update_on = now(),

UPDATE t_org_detail
org_code = #{orgCode},
org_address_relation = #{orgAddressRelation},
elct_Type = #{elctType},
lead_time = #{leadTime},
current_leader_time = #{currentLeaderTime},
current_lead_out_time = #{currentLeadOutTime},
elct_shoud_people_count = #{elctShoudPeopleCount},
elct_act_people_count = #{elctActPeopleCount},
upper_sure_org_count = #{upperSureOrgCount},
act_upper_org_per_count = #{actUpperOrgPerCount},
change_org_relation_auth = #{changeOrgRelationAuth},
is_del_part_person_auth = #{isDelPartPersonAuth},
org_job_phone = #{orgJobPhone},
belong_area = #{belongArea},
trans_code = #{transCode},
fix_phone = #{fixPhone},
address = #{address},
update_by = #{updateBy}, update_on = now(),
mapper.select: select id_, org_id, user_name, positon, allow_leader_time, create_by, update_by from t_org_leader_detail where status='1' and org_id=#{orgId}
mapper.insert: insert into t_org_leader_detail ( id_, org_id, user_name, positon, allow_leader_time, status, create_on, create_by ) values ( #{staticsId}, #{orgId}, #{userName}, #{positon}, #{allowLeaderTime}, '1', now(), #{createBy} )
mapper.update: update t_org_leader_detail set status='0' where org_id=#{orgId} and status='1'
mapper.select: select id_, org_id, reward_name, allow_org, allow_time, create_by, update_by from t_org_reward_detail where status='1' and org_id=#{orgId}
mapper.insert: insert into t_org_reward_detail ( id_, org_id, reward_name, allow_org, allow_time, status, create_on, create_by ) values ( #{staticsId}, #{orgId}, #{rewardName}, #{allowOrg}, #{allowTime}, '1', now(), #{createBy} )
mapper.update: update t_org_reward_detail set status='0' where org_id=#{orgId} and status='1'
mapper.select: select id_, org_id, dept_name, dept_natureType, dept_type, create_by, update_by from t_org_dept_detail where status='1' and org_id=#{orgId}
mapper.insert: insert into t_org_dept_detail ( id_, org_id, dept_name, dept_natureType, dept_type, status, create_on, create_by ) values ( #{staticsId}, #{orgId}, #{deptName}, #{deptNatureType}, #{deptType}, '1', now(), #{createBy} )
mapper.update: update t_org_dept_detail set status='0' where org_id=#{orgId} and status='1'
